website_summaries.verdict: A waffle maker that combines high tech with high taste.
pros: Cook fast, delicious waffles that can be customized with seven different settings
We love the waffle moat that really does eliminate spillage
Comes with simple knob settings enveloped in a sleek, silver design
cons: Small in size according to some

customer_reviews.title: Traditional waffle maker
customer_reviews.text: I received this waffle maker today and made waffles for supper. Finally I have a wonderful traditional waffle maker! The waffles turned out great, just like the ones I grew up with. My old traditional waffle maker died after about 30 years. I had no idea it would be so hard to find a replacement. I bought the Chef's Choice Waffle Pro based on Cooks Illustrated/America's Test Kitchen review, but they should have said it makes really thin waffles. If you like really, really thin waffles that is the one to buy. If you want traditional waffles, not Belgium buy the Breville. The machine is very well made. I am very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: MI Kate

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointing
customer_reviews.text: The best feature is the moat. Unfortunately, it heats unevenly and makes a crummy looking waffle. The bottom turns out brown, but the top comes out splotchy and malformed. I tried adjust the amount of batter to fix the problem, but that didn't help. You'ld think for what they're charging that it would make a decent waffle, but think again.
customer_reviews.author: s. breacain

customer_reviews.title: best with thicker batters that turn out lightly crisped American thin waffles
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, easy to clean especially with thicker batters like King Arthur Belgian style yeast waffles or sourdough starter waffles that don’t spread as quickly. A thinner batter will overflow the sides. To clean, merely pass a wet cloth over the still hot plates and moat. For a golden brown waffle, I turn the dial up. This machine takes roughly a half cup of batter per waffle.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous shopper

customer_reviews.title: waffle maker
customer_reviews.text: searched for a waffle maker that made crispy waffles like my vintage one that broke. Bought this one because of the good reviews on the internet. It definitely is easy to clean, signals when heated and I love that - no guesswork involved! Waffles nice and crispy but so difficult to remove from waffle maker and i am a veteran waffle maker. Low rating due to this factor only.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Breville Quality Shines!
customer_reviews.text: After a few weeks, we are loving our new waffle maker from Breville. It heats up quickly and efficiently; there is no need for any "spray on" coating, as the coating Breville has used really works well. It does NOT make thicker, Belgian-style waffles; but it is not supposed so to do. We love making the waffles ahead of time, freezing them and then popping them into the toaster for a quick dinner. Storage is wonderful with the "lock and stand" feature. The only draw-back, of course, is that it only makes one four-section waffle at a time; but since there are only two of us, it is not really an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Director70

customer_reviews.title: Love It!!!
customer_reviews.text: I got this waffle maker for Christmas and so far I love it. I have had several waffle makers in the past and have never really been happy with them. Love the moat around it, makes clean up quick and easy. Has several lightness/darkness options as well. Like the beeps to signal when preheated and ready also. Overall, I am very impressed with this. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: aprilwine

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste the money
customer_reviews.text: I have a few Breveille products and generally like them, although this one is just not a quality tool. The temperature settings are meaningless. Unless you like undercooked waffles, you have to use only the highest setting, and even then the thing is constantly beeping that the waffle is ready when it is not. You can get better for half the price...
customer_reviews.author: Scott H

customer_reviews.title: Makes great waffles!
customer_reviews.text: We had quite having waffles because our previous waffle maker was challenging to get predictable results with. I did a bunch of research and this one was liked in the comparisons I looked through. Since we have had it, we have found it to work well. We have made three different waffle recipes and each worked well. The key idea we have learned for this waffle maker is to make sure the batter is the right consistency - too thick and it's hard to cook all the way through.
customer_reviews.author: WileEC

customer_reviews.title: Makes great waffles, every time
customer_reviews.text: I love the timer function on this waffle maker. Once you get the temperature dialed in, which really only takes one or two test waffles, you'll never have to check a waffle while it's being made again. It beeps when it's preheated, and again when your waffle is done. Pretty simple. Cleanup is super easy too. The nonstick surface just takes a quick wipe and you're good to put it away. This is my third Breville appliance, and I'll keep buying them. They last several years at least. If you've never worked with their customer service before, it's on point.
customer_reviews.author: Pittrz

customer_reviews.title: Uneven waffles!
customer_reviews.text: Got this waffle maker about a week ago and finally decided to make waffles. It heats up pretty quick, cooks fairly fast but the waffles are SUPER uneven. I made the recipe in the instruction manual that came with the machine. The top is darker but has super light spots but the bottom is not cooked enough IMO. I like my waffles on the darker side therefore I set the darkness at 6 which is one up from max. Made probably 8 waffles and they were all the same. Defiantly not as nice or consistent as my old Waring Pro waffle iron I had before this. On the bright side I’ll be eating less carbs.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Dalzell

customer_reviews.title: crispy waffles
customer_reviews.text: I like the substantial feel of this machine. Unlike other waffle makers I've had that were non-Teflon, this one does produce crispy waffles. Only downside--batter doesn't flow easily between the 4 compartments, but this could be a plus when only wanting to cook less than a whole waffle. I use a brush to smooth the batter over the separationsr.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Rose

customer_reviews.title: Best waffles I have made!
customer_reviews.text: My kids love waffles and I have been using a $20 waffle maker from HomeDepot for years but the mess was always a pain and also you have to on top of the waffles to get it the right amount of crispy without burning them. I decided to invest in this model after reading the reviews and it has been a hit. The kids even love the batter that cooks in the moat!
customer_reviews.author: Keyvan Azami

customer_reviews.title: It Works!
customer_reviews.text: It took two uses to adjust the setting to our liking, but once that was done it worked beautifully. The clean up is truly a breeze; wipe with a damp sponge. I would definately recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: LaneyP45

customer_reviews.title: Will serve homemade waffles a lot more often now
customer_reviews.text: I've loved waffles all my life. And hated waffle irons. Messy, hard to clean, hard to determine when the waffles were done the way I wanted. This morning's waffles were yummy, cooked just the right length of time, and cleanup was easy. The unit feels sturdy, like it will last a long time. I am delighted.
customer_reviews.author: Martha W. Bonney

customer_reviews.title: Thinner, less dough, delicious and easy to use !
customer_reviews.text: Although the waffles are much thinner than an America style waffle, they are delicious and require half the dough, still as filling as a regular thicker waffle ! Loved it !
customer_reviews.author: Monica S-C

customer_reviews.title: The best ever!
customer_reviews.text: I NEVER write reviews but this is awesome! We have been looking for years for a good waffle iron and this is it!!! So easy to use, alerts you when the waffle is Cooke- and is was perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Dyanne Coon

customer_reviews.title: CRISPY AND TASTY!!!
customer_reviews.text: This waffle iron is good in every way!! Cooks as you like it, easy to clean, and waffles don’t stick to the metal! Absolutely fantastic!!!
customer_reviews.author: Robert R Crowder

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality
customer_reviews.text: I have nothing bad to say about this product. I have used several items similar to this over the years and this by far the best quality and easiest to use. I really love the no spill edges because it makes the process of making waffles so much cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product worth the money, I always try to stay with breville products this being my third in my kitchen. Definitely would recommend, you get what you pay for
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Bene

customer_reviews.title: Great Waffle Maker
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice waffle maker. Makes great waffles.. it is hard to hear the beep and it doesn’t make Belgian waffles. But overall I’m very happy with it. I would highly recommend it. Best part it’s easy to clean and no mess!
customer_reviews.author: Nedina Mary Nordquist

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Breville appliance that I have bought in the past 3 years and they are built so well, last so long and look good. Highly recommend anything that they make.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Broke after six months with a few uses
customer_reviews.text: After just six months it broke. On the lowest setting it burns the waffles. Used a couple times a month. Disappointed
customer_reviews.author: P. J.

customer_reviews.title: Delicious waffles.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to make waffles for our grandchildren. The waffles were delicious and crispy on the outside.. Like most Breville products, it seems well made.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Arthur Schwartz

customer_reviews.title: Perfect little waffle maker.
customer_reviews.text: It makes perfect waffles every time. Everyone can have the exact color and crispness they want.
customer_reviews.author: marie

customer_reviews.title: Good if you like your waffle in four pieces!
customer_reviews.text: The lid on my 30 year old Sunbeam waffle maker broke so I decided to upgrade to this one after reading the reviews. It cooks well but the waffle stays in the deep grid on the bottom and breaks into four pieces no matter what method you use to remove it. I would have given it five stars except for that.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly cooked waffles everytime
customer_reviews.text: Makes perfect waffles... and if the coating is coming off its probably from using cooking spray which is not supported to be used on non stick🤷🏿‍♂️
customer_reviews.author: derek l gleaves

customer_reviews.title: It heats up quick and the drip tray is big and super easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my mother and she absolutely loves it. It heats up quick and the drip tray is big and super easy to clean. I received a waffle maker around the same time and I wish I would have gotten this one instead!
customer_reviews.author: Bryce Cole Wisco

customer_reviews.title: Decent machine if you like thin waffles
customer_reviews.text: Makes a much thinner waffle than I was expecting. Not for Belgian waffle aficionados.
customer_reviews.author: Alexa Friedman-Cohen

customer_reviews.title: Breville quality.
customer_reviews.text: Used it for the first time this past weekend. The drip edge is great, followed instructions and made great waffels!
customer_reviews.author: John in Indy

customer_reviews.title: Bought two!
customer_reviews.text: We have this waffle iron & used at Thanksgiving. Bought two for Christmas gifts since it was such a hit with our daughters’families.
customer_reviews.author: Primer Mama

customer_reviews.title: Best gift ever!
customer_reviews.text: I have this as a Christmas gift to a dear friend and got nothing but rave reviews!!
customer_reviews.author: Chester Elton

customer_reviews.title: sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Looks and feels of high quality. Makes beautiful waffles every time. Family loves it. Looks/feels like it might last a life time.
customer_reviews.author: wayne stogner

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: Our 30plus year old waffle maker was never this good!
customer_reviews.author: M T

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Even on the lowest setting your waffle still comes out dark and over cooked, you have to watch closely and take it out way before the ready light comes on and it’s also very hard to get out if you don’t spray some oil on the grids.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Ideal Size .. Works well
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. I use the lowest setting or the waffles get quite crispy
customer_reviews.author: L. Perez

customer_reviews.title: I love it.
customer_reviews.text: First time using. No overflow, perfect browning, no sticking (even with no oil) and no cleanup. It’s a beautiful appliance. Waffles smaller than usual. Perfect for just the two of us.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Joiner

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Disliked that waffles were small and thin. Browning function does not work - levels one through three were exactly the same. Returned it.
customer_reviews.author: jnewman

customer_reviews.title: Best EVER!!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchase Braville products for a reason. I'm never disappointed. Cooks perfectly. Just give time to heat up. Perfect waffles when you leave it in until it beeps. Perfect every time. Have used this allot since I purchased.
customer_reviews.author: DJ Thorstenson

customer_reviews.title: Standard waffle maker, but a very good one!
customer_reviews.text: Not a Belgian waffle maker, but makes great standard waffles. The no mess ring works great.
customer_reviews.author: Arc_Chaser13

customer_reviews.title: Waffle iron
customer_reviews.text: It is hard to get the waffles out. The temperature is great not so easy to clean. But very easy to use. If there is a run over at all the reservoir is nice because it stays without making a mess.
customer_reviews.author: sharrold k.

customer_reviews.title: I have used this waffle maker several times. It ...
customer_reviews.text: I have used this waffle maker several times. It cooks quite fast and so it should serve well at family brunch.
customer_reviews.author: SBaca

customer_reviews.title: Terrific
customer_reviews.text: I love this waffle maker. I have looked for a really good one for years and I have finally found it!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Fawcett

customer_reviews.title: Not deep enough
customer_reviews.text: I wish this product was deeper to make thick Belgium waffles.
customer_reviews.author: Paulette Currie

customer_reviews.title: easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Consistent, easy to use, easy to clean, easy to store.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Simonsen

customer_reviews.title: This waffle maker has the 65 California cancer warning, it is made in China, very large and heavy. Not worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: This waffle maker has the 65 California cancer warning, it is made in China, very large and heavy. Not worth the price. I can buy a $20 waffle maker with these standards!
customer_reviews.author: Marti

customer_reviews.title: This waffle maker is truly awesome! Pretty much fool proof in terms of operation
customer_reviews.text: This waffle maker is truly awesome! Pretty much fool proof in terms of operation. Just listen to the beeps when it is heated and then after the batter pour and when its cooked. Perfection!!!
customer_reviews.author: Alan V. Polo

customer_reviews.title: No mess not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Very hard to get the waffles out of this waffle maker. The no spill feature means that waffles get produced in a recessed pocket which makes it hard to safely remove the waffles without scratching the non-stick surface.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the Extra Cost!
customer_reviews.text: We used to use the flip-over type maker, but it stopped working, and we prefer Breville products. This waffle maker is compact with a good length cord. The browning setting works very well. The overflow spill area for no mess is just that, no mess at all. This makes an adequately thick waffle, not belgium thick. The unit gets super hot, and therefore the waffle cooks extremely fast, allowing us to make waffles for the whole family very quickly. We decided to spend about $30 more for a Breville, and it definitely worth it
customer_reviews.author: orthodoc71

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Waffle Maker
customer_reviews.text: I have 7 and now 8 waffle makers dating back to my parents waffle maker from the 1940's. I also have a number of other Breville products and they have all held up really well and work as expected. This is now my favorite waffle maker because it is super easy to clean and makes about a near perfect waffle or my version of a perfect waffle. This is not a Belgian waffle maker. This make the more or less tradition waffle which is not as thick and does not have the fewer but larger holes that a Belgian waffle has.
customer_reviews.author: WLH

customer_reviews.title: Great Product - Would Buy Again
customer_reviews.text: This waffle maker is as described and rated. A very well made product. It's small for tight cupboards. It makes one waffle at a time, but it makes them quickly. Easy to make 4 to take to the table. It cooks evenly and reheats quickly. It's easy to clean. We read product reviews and chose the best for us. We are very pleased. If it lasts forever like most irons do, it is well worth the purchase price.
customer_reviews.author: v.m.

customer_reviews.title: Drop some dough on the right waffle maker
customer_reviews.text: I had tolerated cheap and mediocre waffle makers for the past two decades. It was time for me to drop some dough on a decent waffle maker. If you're willing to spend this much on a waffle maker, this is the one you want. It's sturdy, well-built and easy to clean. This thing is 3 times heavier than my last cheapo waffle maker. That's a good thing. You can tell the plates are sturdy and rugged, able to take heat after heat. I'm making everything into waffles now. No more fighting with sticking material, broken waffles, an hour of cleaning and overflow frustrations. It's now a joy to cook waffles and I'm turning everything into waffles.
customer_reviews.author: LK

customer_reviews.title: Not even a year and it won't heat up.
customer_reviews.text: I cannot believe how expensive this waffle maker is. We invested because it had good reviews and didn't want it to break down for years. I have only had it for 9 months and it doesn't heat up. I am writing this review in hopes Breville does the thing, in which I will revise on how the handle it.
customer_reviews.author: Marianne Storath

customer_reviews.title: Breville is quality
customer_reviews.text: Breville makes outstanding appliances. Yes they are pricey but only have to buy them once. These are pieces that are built like the old Toastmasters of the 50's but with modern technology upgrades. I have found that Amazon Warehouse Deals are a great way to save money on items like this. Oh yes it makes great waffles
customer_reviews.author: Baja Ron

customer_reviews.title: Terrific!
customer_reviews.text: Have made waffles just about every week for 35 years. This is a superbly designed waffle maker. My recipes have needed slight adjustments, and although they are nearly sugar free, I find the lowest heat setting works best. I can't imagine what recipe would ever require the highest setting.
customer_reviews.author: Gluten Free Oma

customer_reviews.title: Reliable waffle maker
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good waffle iron. Waffles turn out evenly cooked, top and bottom. I experimented with the temperature control until I found the setting that cooks to my preference. This appliance is so easy to clean I can't believe it. I would recommend this product. You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t cook evenly.
customer_reviews.text: It didn’t cook the waffles evenly for a nice crispy golden color. There was always a circular section on the top of the waffle in the center that was almost white and doughy, even on the highest setting. I returned it for another. Same problem! Now, I’m returning the second one and buying a rectangular one.
customer_reviews.author: MGS

customer_reviews.title: Love it and worth all the money!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this waffel make! Temp control, timer and overspill rim are great functions for this waffel maker. Super easy to use, easy to get waffles out and easy to clean. My 2 year old always wants waffels and this is fun to use all the time!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Solid & well made - Difficult to remove waffle
customer_reviews.text: The temp setting, non-stick surface, and overall construction are solid. However, it's difficult to remove the waffle due to the recessed waffle iron. None of the waffle sticks above the iron surface once cooked, so you have to stab the waffle and sort of pry it out.
customer_reviews.author: Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Flawless
customer_reviews.text: I was given a waffle maker some years ago as a present and it was a disaster. This waffle maker that I purchased has been wonderful. I've only had it a couple of weeks but it turns out beautiful waffles and cleanup is almost too simple. It looks beautiful as well........
customer_reviews.author: bearwhosits

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a cuisinart waffle maker not long ago. It was total garbage, and took forever to make 1 waffle. I know Breville makes amazing products from the toaster I have. This waffle maker doesn't disappoint!! It is a very well thought out design, easy to clean, and works quickly. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: William Flood

customer_reviews.title: a step up
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for something to replace a cheapo waffle maker that broke. The mote does a good job of catching the overflow so that clean up is easy. I like how the top locks down for storage.
customer_reviews.author: Kfish

customer_reviews.title: The best so far
customer_reviews.text: Had a cuisinart waffle maker that eventually flaked out. This is solidly made, the non-stick coating is still working. The little overflow reservoir is nice. Makes consistent waffles. Hope it lasts.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Bakes a great waffle has a light that tells you when unitbis up to temperature and also lets you know when waffle is baked. The design catches any over fill but as the directions say use a 1/2 cup per waffle and it makes a perfect the perfect waffle.
customer_reviews.author: M. Palmieri

customer_reviews.title: Makes perfect waffles.
customer_reviews.text: This waffle maker produces perfect, slightly crisp waffles with burning them. Throw away your old one that makes limp, soggy waffles and try this one.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Radke

customer_reviews.title: The "moat" around the grill is a wonderful asset. No more cleanup mess!
customer_reviews.text: The "moat" around the grill is a wonderful asset. No more cleanup mess! Worth the extra money. We prefer the standard waffles to the thick ones, and this maker does a great job. Had one small issue, but their customer support talked me through it. No problems since.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This is the best waffle maker I have used. Easy to use, easy to clean and I can now make waffles at home, awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Jones

customer_reviews.title: Perfect waffles everytime
customer_reviews.text: Replace a failed 20 year old waffle maker with this. Tried 3 others that didnt work well at all this one is excellent, good quality makes perfect waffles every time
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works with fish!
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had the chance to make waffles. Putting salmon on the griddle makes near-perfect patties. Good for entrees or for sandwiches.
customer_reviews.author: HLB Engineering

customer_reviews.title: Breville Does It Again
customer_reviews.text: We have an 9 year old Breville Toaster Oven so we gambled on the waffle iron. Fantastic machine, no it's not no stick, nothing that says it's no stick is. Use spray and pour it on like Waffle House!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best waffle machine outhere
customer_reviews.text: This is the best machine you will buy. Your waffles will come out perfect each time you prepare waffles at home.
customer_reviews.author: oswaldo chamorro

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use & clean up is a breeze. Love the timer beep too. The best part is that my kids can make waffles by themselves now!
customer_reviews.author: Happy Camper

customer_reviews.title: Best Waffle Maker Ever!
customer_reviews.text: Best Waffle Maker Ever! It takes a few times to figure out how to not make it overflow, but once you figure it out it is SO easy. Would buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Jennylee83

customer_reviews.title: Makes perfect waffles every time. You just have to find the setting that you like
customer_reviews.text: Makes perfect waffles every time. You just have to find the setting that you like
customer_reviews.author: Glenn Stauffer

customer_reviews.title: Not a good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Not that great. It is not a Belgium waffle machine that’s how it was advertised
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best waffle maker you will ever have
customer_reviews.text: This makes the absolute best waffles I have ever had in my life! And I have tried many other waffle makers! This product is the best!
customer_reviews.author: Diane Daffron

customer_reviews.title: Great waffle maker!
customer_reviews.text: Makes beautiful waffles! Even great for Belgian ones. Very compact and easy to use!
customer_reviews.author: Alan Tatourian

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Makes great waffles - sparingly uses batter and they come out superbly.
customer_reviews.author: ROBERT M.

customer_reviews.title: The little waffle maker that could
customer_reviews.text: Heats evenly. Bakes crisp waffles at the highest thermostat setting. Waffles are on the thin side; definitely not Belgian waffles.
customer_reviews.author: Annemieke

customer_reviews.title: It really is no mess
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Christmas gift and he absolutely loved it. Says he's never used a waffle maker that doesn't stick or make a mess (seriously the name's not kidding). Overall very satisfied and I get to eat waffles all the time so what's not to love.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: it is good to use,look better。But when I looked carefully ,somewhere is bad and there is a bug。
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Breville BWM520XL Round Waffle Waffle Maker, Brushed Stainless Steel
product_meta.description: Good waffle batters start with sticky ingredients. How do you make crispy golden waffles without the mess? The wide wrap around moat catches and cooks overflow for easy cleanup. Browning control for customized waffle cooking from light and fluffy to crispy golden brown.
feature_bullets: Wide wrap-around moat catches and cooks overflow.
Darkness Control Dial: 7 Darkness settings allow you to customize your waffle color from light to dark.
Thermal Pro Even Heat: Thermally engineered heating elements ensure even heat distribution.
Construction Materials: Stainless Steel Housing and Die-Cast Aluminum Cooking Plates
Non-Stick Surface: Premium PFOA-free nonstick prevents waffles from sticking.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars248 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
